name: 2d Shooter Tutorial (alexfortsch)
description:
This is my tutorial complete of my 2d shooter. This is just the basic tutorial, excepted i duplicated the level one more time so that I could have a level 3.

Proposed modifications:

1. Custom Music Change

2. New Levels with more enemies

     2.5 Change levels 2 and 3 to be more unique

3. Try to add a unit spawner, with a "free for all" / "sandbox" mode
